sql.name: networkqualityhoncholink
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1) as 工单号, t.c700000001 as 工单类型, t.c700000003 as 工单编号, t.c700000006 as 建单时间,t.c700000004 as 建单人, t.c700000011 as 主题,t.c700000015 as 紧急程度, t.c700000014 as 所属专业,t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {100} t,{200} u,{300} g,{400} gu where t.c700000005=u.C630000001 and u.C1=gu.C620000028 and gu.C620000027=g.C1 {2} {3} {4}
